thing-type.label: Molite Movement sensor with temperature and light sensor
thing-type.description:
Movement sensor with temperature and light sensor

Overview

Basic operations

  • The MoLiTe can detect movement,
  • The MoLiTe can measure light intensity
  • The MoLiTe can measure the temperature
  • The MoLiTe can trigger a security system

Inclusion Information

Press and hold the tamper switch for 2 seconds and release to start the inclusion or exclude process


Exclusion Information

Press and hold the tamper switch for 2 seconds and release to start the inclusion or exclude process


Wakeup Information

It is possible to send a wake up notification on user interaction. To do this press and hold the tamper switch for four seconds (mount the device).

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Reset to factory settings
parameter.description: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Mode timeout
parameter.description:
Mode timeout

Overview

The time used in mode 2 to turn the sensor off. This time will start running as soon as detection is seen.

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: Switch off time
parameter.description:
Switch off time

Overview

The switch off time will start running as soon as mode timeout is done.

The Motion sensor is turned on and when movement is detected again.

The mode timeout (cfg param 1) will start running all over again.

When switch off time is done a basic off message is sent to the associated node

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: sensitivity
parameter.description: the sensitivity of the motion circuit

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: The mode
parameter.description: The mode that is entered after detection

options.option: Mode 1: no detection possible. Battery save mode.
Z-Wave chip is always on to request
